lines.text: We came to save you, Jobe.
In here, I am the savior.
Out there people look at me and they see half a person. But in here, they see what I want them to see... how I really am.
[after defeating Jobe in the cyberspace sword fight]
You're just a lawnmower man, Jobe!
Jobe, what happened to the memory?
I don't need the Kiron Chip anymore... I've *become* the chip!

[running with Peter]
By the way, who are you?
Tell me what "Egypt" means, Doctor, before I get really FUCKING PISSED OFF!
Why do I let you into my life?
